name: Box N Sewers
description:
The game is about a sentient box traversing the dangerous sewers of an unknown city. Help Terrence survive against slime monsters as you, the player, help him find the key to open the gate to freedom and escape the sewers filled with toxic waste.

Credits:

Programmer: Marnus Labuschagne

Artists: Nico Faulmann & Mark Shope

Sound: Gerbrandt van der Walt

Game Designer: Pierre Jonatan Jordaan

Sounds from Zap Splat.
